title: Ghanaian Village
brief_description: Looks at a day in the life of a family living in a Ghanaian fishing village. Division of labour, preparation of food and daily activity are some of the highlights.
description: Looks at a day in the life of a family living in a Ghanaian fishing village. Division of labour, preparation of food and daily activity are some of the highlights.
